query: SELECT 'users' as source, id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'staff_admin' UNION ALL SELECT 'adminPermissions' as source, userId as id, CAST(status AS CHAR) as username, 'perm' as role FROM adminPermissions ORDER BY source, id;
